thread.section_title: Hotel Joke - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A fun hotel that won't disappoint
thread.title_full: A fun hotel that won't disappoint - Review of Hotel Joke - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mwp2930
title: A fun hotel that won't disappoint
text: My wife and I stayed here on two separate occasions in March 2017 for our honeymoon. It's very clean, in a great location, and the quirks associated with the theme are charming. Staff was helpful and the free snacks and beverages in the room and lobby were also very much appreciated.
